ground_truth.thought: 推荐一些信用查询频率管理工具或服务
ground_truth.name: CreditScore.recommend_tools

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'CreditScore.get_current_frequency_and_score', 'description': 'Get the current credit query frequency and credit score of a user', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'user_id', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the user ID'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'frequency', 'description': 'the current credit query frequency'}, {'name': 'score', 'description': 'the current credit score'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我想了解如何通过增加信用查询频率来改善个人信用记录。首先，获取我当前的信用查询频率和信用评分。接着，分析这些频率对信用评分的影响。然后，提供一些增加信用查询频率的策略和建议。最后，请推荐一些信用查询频率管理工具或服务。
获取我当前的信用查询频率和信用评分
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
CreditScore.get_current_frequency_and_score
当前工具的参数'user_id'的值是什么?
user_id_123
{'frequency': '3 queries per month', 'score': '720'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'frequency': '3 queries per month', 'score': '720'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
分析这些频率对信用评分的影响
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
CreditScore.analyze_frequency_impact
当前工具的参数'frequency'的值是什么?
3 queries per month
{'impact': 'Moderate positive impact on credit score with increased frequency'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'impact': 'Moderate positive impact on credit score with increased frequency'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
提供一些增加信用查询频率的策略和建议
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
CreditScore.provide_strategies
当前工具的参数'frequency'的值是什么?
3 queries per month

{'strategies': '1. Regularly check credit reports from multiple bureaus. 2. Use credit monitoring services to track changes. 3. Apply for new credit sparingly but regularly to show creditworthiness.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'strategies': '1. Regularly check credit reports from multiple bureaus. 2. Use credit monitoring services to track changes. 3. Apply for new credit sparingly but regularly to show creditworthiness.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
